author: S Mal
title: Amazing
body: I have ordered it 4 times & will continue to till 400 coz it's so good. The smell is to die for. It's so fresh ❤️

author: Ruqayyah Asiri
title: Good
body:
I purchased the small size just for trial and I'm very happy with quality of the product. I again got the bigger size i loved the packaging. 
The deodorant smells very nice and its effect last for whole day and it also moisturized the skin and give very smooth feeling of that area.
I highly recommend it

author: JB
title: A cruelty free deodorant like no other!
body: After experimenting with multiple brands, both global and local, I keep coming back to this. Best suited for the humid climate in Mumbai, all year round. No allergic reaction, long-lasting and effective. Highly recommend it.

author: Renuka Nadkarni
body: love using Jc products, they are good

author: Vidhyapriya K T
body: Awesome products and excellent service. Would love to recommend to friends and family and recommended as well

author: Vidhyalakshmi Manickavasagam
body: love using Jc products, they are good

author: S.B.
title: Amazing Deodorant
body: It does the way it is specified in the feature. It has got a wonderful fragrance which neutralises body odour. As a lactating mother I would highly recommend it. You got to see multiple changes in the body during this phase but this deodorant helps you to feel fresh

author: Jisha Ganesh
title: Light and Fragrant!
body: I have had the best experience using the deodorant. I had issues with hyperpigmentation, and after using the product for the past two months, I can see visible difference. It is light to use and lasts through the day.

author: Rithik S
title: Fragrance
body: Glad that the natural deodorant produces very cool fragnance. Loving it. Packaging can be made better.

author: Mithra Ramakrishnan
title: Excellent
body:
Very nice deodorant. I am using it for my daughter and I totally love it 
. So ordered few more items

author: Runjhun Malhotra
title: The best organic, non-toxic deo in the Indian market
body:
The deodorant stick is in sustainable packaging - no plastic on there. This is comforting as packaging and the waste it creates is a concern for me always. it glides on easy even in extreme weather conditions. Aside from this, the fragrance is just absolutely lovely! One gets a cooling sensation upon application and I have found it to provide24 hour protection from odour. 
Just LOVE Juicy Chemistry!

author: Vishruta Rahul Moondra
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: Vishruta Rahul Moondra
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: V.R.M.
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: V.R.M.
title: Perfect deo
body: Before I delve into the product details, I must first say that I love the sustainable packaging. I loved the fragrance. However, I wish you offered atleast a 100 gram product for the price. Overall, good work 🙂

author: Ann Cheeran
body: Love the smell! Wish it was a little bigger in size though for the price.

author: Sushrut Munje Vhora
title: Loved it!
body: Smells good. Easy to use. Highly recommended.

author: R.R.
title: Great deodorant, no turning back!
body: I switched to natural deodorants way before I discovered the Juicy Chemistry deodorant. But this Blood Orange & Geranium deodorant has the best fragrance and skin-friendly feeling. Props for including baking soda among all ingredients. I'd love for JC to add some more fragrances to this line. A big thank you for launching this product in India.

author: T.M.
title: Good deodorant
body: It is a good natural deodorant, has helped keep body odour at bay. It does last a good amount of hours in the hot and humid weather of Mumbai. It does have a peculiar pain relief balm kinda smell. It doesn't bother me but I hope the scent of the product can be changed using natural ingredients.

author: G.D.
title: a must buy
body: I was on the lookout for a replacement of chemical deodorant with an organic one. Found this and tested it in summers of mumbai heat and I must say it held well from morning till evening. I was happy.

author: Krishnan HG
title: Very good
body: Its very good but i could not buy the next consignment. Its not available anymore?

author: Megha Thimmaiah
title: Blood Orange Deodorant the best ever
body: Writing the review after my 2nd purchase of blood orange roll on , the deodorant once applied in the morning stays upto evening, no sweat anymore and my underarms were dark before now i can see it is back to its original color no more darkness. I am genuinely happy with this product for life my day doesn't go without this now.
